PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>

DELETE 
	{	?dataset dcat:contactPoint ?contact .
		?contact ?p ?o }
INSERT
	{ 	?dataset dcat:contactPoint ?skolem .
		?skolem ?p ?o }
WHERE
	{ 	?dataset dcat:contactPoint ?contact .
		?contact ?p ?o 
		BIND(IRI(
			CONCAT('http://data.gov.be/.well-known/genid/', 
					MD5(STR(?contact))
				)) as ?skolem)
		FILTER ISBLANK(?contact)
	}
